description.value: If the character has gained at least 4 Pain Tokens during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain the Stuff of Nightmares Trait for the remainder of the encounter. Stuff of Nightmares: immune to Poison, disease, needing to breathe, most environmental hazards, bleeding, stunning, and any critical effect that would kill you if not dealt through a Psychic Power, Force Weapon, or Holy Attack. (Warning, while this does stop you from dying through most conventional means, it doesn't stop you being turned into a pile of broken limbs and meat).
